quest.name: Bottoms Up
journal: Weidheri is in need of a helping hand.
objectives: Deliver bottles of arak to the soldiers of Ala Ghiri.

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: Oi, adventurer. If you're planning to linger a while, would you mind making a small delivery for me?

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: I thought I'd give the soldiers a sample of my wares, as a show of appreciation for taking back Ala Ghiri. With all these customers, though, I'm too busy by half.

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: Would you mind passing around a few bottles of this here spirits? I'm sure they've worked up quite a thirst.

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: After all they've done for us, a few bottles of spirits is the least I can offer to thank them.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA02830
dialogue.text: Is there something I can help you with, misssir?

dialogue.name: SOLDIERA02830
dialogue.text: A bottle of spirits? Why, how generous of them. With my shift ending soon, this is just what I needed to relax.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERB02830
dialogue.text: Oh my, a bottle of Gyr Abanian spirits. I take it the people here are in a celebrating mood? Hmmm... I think I'll go and have a drink right now.

dialogue.name: HEWELIN
dialogue.text: Gods, am I thirsty...Why is it so insufferably hot today...

dialogue.name: HEWELIN
dialogue.text: A bottle of spirits to celebrate? This couldn't have come at a better time. Thank you.

dialogue.name: HEWELIN
dialogue.text: The Gyr Abanians always were a hospitable lot. Thankfully some things never change.

dialogue.name: PALEMORNING
dialogue.text: Good eveningGood morningGood day, adventurer. What can I do for you?

dialogue.name: PALEMORNING
dialogue.text: That's awfully kind of you. Obviously I can't drink this now, but pass along my thanks all the same.

dialogue.name: PALEMORNING
dialogue.text: It's an awfully tempting gift, but I really should wait until my watch is over.

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: Thanks for that. Nothing like a bottle of spirits to lift one's spirits, I always say.

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: <sigh> Ala Ghiri's been through so much over the years. It does my heart good to know we can breathe free again.

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: That's why I decided to give these brave soldiers my very best bottles of arak. It's a special brew made right here in Ala Ghiri.

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: To be honest I'm not sure how I'll replenish my stocks, but it's worth it to see everyone enjoying themselves. We've had enough worrying to last us a lifetime.

dialogue.name: WEIDHERI
dialogue.text: For now I say we drink, and enjoy the taste of victory.
